mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into house (styleValue,houseType,areaValue,formValue,city,time,original,plane,price,designerId,workerIds,typeValue,title,des,mainPic) values (#{styleValue},#{houseType},#{areaValue},#{formValue},#{city},#{time},#{original},#{plane},#{price},#{designerId},#{workerIds},#{typeValue},#{title},#{des},#{mainPic})
mapper.select: SELECT house.*,housearea.name area,houseform.name form,housetype.name type,styleindex.name style,designer.name designer FROM house ,houseform ,housetype, styleindex, designer, housearea WHERE house.houseId = #{id} AND house.areaValue = housearea.id AND house.formValue = houseform.id AND house.typeValue = housetype.id AND house.styleValue = styleindex.id AND house.designerId = designer.id

select house.*,designer.name as designer from house, designer where 1=1 and (house.designerId = designer.id) and (house.styleValue like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{style},'%')) or #{style}='') and (typeValue=#{type} or #{type}='') and (formValue=#{form} or #{form}='') and (areaValue=#{area} or #{area}='')

SELECT house.*,housearea.name AREA,houseform.name form,housetype.name,styleindex.name type,designer.name designer FROM house, housearea ,houseform ,housetype, styleindex, designer WHERE house.areaValue = housearea.id AND house.formValue = houseform.id AND house.typeValue = housetype.id AND house.styleValue = styleindex.id AND house.designerId = designer.id

SELECT house.*,housearea.name AREA,houseform.name form,housetype.name,styleindex.name type,designer.name designer FROM house, housearea ,houseform ,housetype, styleindex, designer WHERE house.areaValue = housearea.id AND house.formValue = houseform.id AND house.typeValue = housetype.id AND house.styleValue = styleindex.id AND house.designerId = designer.id AND designerId = #{designerId}
